original: "Boss came down to show our supplier around.  Professional-looking person, would look more at home teaching college kids than working with the Organization.  Didn't seem even the least bit squeamish about the animals though.  Given she works for wherever we get our mutagen and CBMs, I don't want to even think about the shit they must be used to.  Didn't even fucking flinch when one of the freaks in Red Team broke its jaw gnawing on the bars, when she and the boss walked past its cell."
translation: “老板来带我们的供应商到处看看。看起来很专业的人，更像是在家里教大学的孩子，而不是在组织里工作。不过，她对动物似乎一点也不害羞。考虑到她在我们得到诱变剂和CBM的任何地方工作，我甚至不想去想他们必须习惯的狗屎。当红队的一个怪物咬断了它的下巴，咬着铁条，当她和老板走过它的牢房时，他妈的一点也不退缩。"
context:

original: "Fight was a complete no-show, none of the clients even called in.  Something's going down back in town, can't get ahold of the boss either.  Going to lock primary access and hit full cell unlock, let the animals have fun tearing each others throats out.  Oughta keep them distracted so I can try and find out what the fuck is going on up there."
translation: “打架是完全没有表现出来的，甚至没有一个客户打电话进来。镇上发生了什么事，也联系不到老板。要锁定主要通道并打开全牢房的锁，让动物们享受撕扯彼此喉咙的乐趣。应该让它们分心，这样我就可以试着了解那里到底发生了什么。”

Boss is worried that vetting clients is going to make the next show a complete waste of time. original: "One of the long-runners on Red Team's getting a bit too smart for its own good.  It's figured out the bars won't give, so instead trashed the toilet in its cell.  Think it knows we have to move it to another cell while we replace the shitter.  The boss is also looking to get his supplier to get their hands on some PE065, that should make it a bit easier to keep contained like the rest.  Might make the next show more fun too."
translation: “红队的一名长跑运动员为了自己的利益变得有点太聪明了。他们发现酒吧不会让路，所以就把厕所扔进了他们的牢房。想想看，他们知道我们必须把厕所搬到另一个牢房去，同时我们要更换厕所。老板还想让他的供应商拿到一些PE065，这应该会让事情变得有点复杂。”像其他人一样更容易控制。可能会让下一个节目更有趣。"

original: A vaguely human-shaped shell of alien sinew and steel support, covered in armor plates made of resin.  Salvaged using pre-cataclysm research into other living weaponry, it's been practically mutilated to fit a human (or mutant) wearer.  Activating it will reduce the suit's encumbrance, enhance strength and dexterity, protect the wearer from toxic gas, serve as a rebreather, enhance stamina and carry capacity, and provide some protection from outside temperature.  It seems to recharge from sunlight, and being active will also gradually fatigue the user and affect healthiness, plus render them more vulnerable to electric shocks.
translation: 一种模糊不清的人形外壳，由外星肌腱和钢支架构成，外面覆盖着树脂制成的装甲板。通过灾难前对其他活体武器的研究，它被打捞上来，实际上已经被肢解，以适合人类（或变种）佩戴者。激活它将减少西服的负担，增强力量和灵活性，保护穿着者免受有毒气体的伤害，充当呼吸者，增强耐力和承载能力，并提供一定程度的外界温度保护。它似乎是从阳光中重新充电，而且活动也会逐渐使使用者疲劳，影响健康，并使他们更容易受到电击。

original: Ah, I see.  Well then, you should likely be familiar with how dangerous these things are.  You'll likely run into a lot more of these things, but the work I need done will be a major help for those surviving out there in the region.  Come see me when you're ready.
translation: 啊，我明白了。那么，你应该很熟悉这些东西有多危险。你可能会遇到更多这样的事情，但我需要做的工作将对那些在该地区生存的人有很大帮助。准备好了就来看我。

original: All your life you have been experimented on and forced to fight others for the amusement of your masters. Never having seen the sun or the outside the cataclysm gave you a chance at freedom. Now you just have to escape from your fellow combatants...
translation: 在你的一生中，你一直在做实验，为了你主人的娱乐，你被迫与他人战斗。从未见过太阳或外面的灾难给了你一个自由的机会。现在你只需要逃离你的战友。。。

original: Alright, I'll mark the location on your map.  I want you to exercise extreme caution.  Those things are likely to still be in the area, and they're not easy to take down.  If things look too hectic there, break contact and try not to get in over your head.  I feel bad enough sending you off on a mission like this as it is, but we'll need people who can handle far bigger threats.  So please, don't get yourself killed.
translation: 好的，我会在你的地图上标出位置。我要你格外小心。这些东西很可能仍在该地区，而且不容易取下。如果那里的事情看起来过于繁忙，那就中断联系，尽量不要插手。我觉得让你去执行这样的任务已经够糟糕了，但我们需要能够应对更大威胁的人。所以求你了，别让你自己死。

original: An accurized laser rifle, designed to deal massive damage to a single target.  Intended to be used as a long-range support weapon by modern special forces.  Requires an insane amount of energy to fire a single powerful laser, additionally providing EMP effects.  The manufacturer is listed as Omnitech Labs.  This one has been converted to use a UPS, a modification to allow sustained operations in the field in case resupply is not available.
translation: 一种精确激光步枪，设计用于对单个目标造成巨大伤害。被现代特种部队用作远程支援武器。需要一个疯狂的能量量来发射一个强大的激光，另外提供电磁脉冲效果。制造商被列为Omnitech实验室。这一个已经转换为使用UPS，这是一种修改，以允许在无法再补给的情况下在现场持续作业。

original: An experimental laser rifle based on the A7 and AKRO-388, offering the handling of a modern combat rifle with the efficiency of a laser weapon, in a relatively compact package. translation: 一种基于A7和AKRO-388的实验性激光步枪，在一个相对紧凑的包装中，能够以激光武器的效率处理现代战斗步枪。制造商被列为Omnitech实验室。由原子能电池或实验性可充电电池供电，用于UPS短期内不可持续的大量使用。

original: An experimental laser rifle based on the A7 and AKRO-388, offering the handling of a modern combat rifle with the efficiency of a laser weapon, in a relatively compact package. original: Huh.  Looking at you, I'm willing to give you the benefit of the doubt.  Plenty of reasons to want to be more discreet.  Then you should know that the project left a lot of unfinished business, a lot of problems for you and I to clean up.  A lot of unwilling test subjects discarded, and now taking it out on what's left of the human race.  If you think you're ready, I should have something for you.
translation: 呵呵。看着你，我愿意让你相信我的怀疑。有很多理由希望更加谨慎。那么你应该知道，这个项目留下了很多未完成的事情，很多问题需要你和我去清理。许多不情愿的测试对象被抛弃了，现在他们把它发泄在剩下的人类身上。如果你认为你准备好了，我应该给你点东西。

translation: 我和另外一个人来到这里，只是勉强避开了当地热点的不死族人群。这家伙是从某个单位来的，作为保安什么的。我们出发后不久就与其他军队失去了联系，所以我们决定跟随我们的领导，从那里找到解决办法。

original: I guess memory wipe makes sense.  Alright, I will explain.  Some time ago, the military launched a joint research project with an end goal of creating artificial combatants, made to perform various specific tasks - basically, living weapons.  They wanted them to be as low-maintenance as possible.  So to accomplish that, the research team used resources from already ongoing projects to first mutate and then cybernetically enhance humans, focusing on developing whatever qualities the military needed at the time.  You are one them, a Bio-Weapon they called it.  This is the lab where you were created.
translation: 我想记忆擦除是有道理的。好的，我会解释的。不久前，军方启动了一项联合研究项目，最终目标是创造人工战斗员，用于执行各种具体任务——基本上是活武器。他们希望它们尽可能低维护。因此，为了实现这一目标，研究团队利用已经在进行的项目中的资源，首先对人类进行变异，然后在控制论上增强人类，重点发展当时军队需要的任何品质。你是他们中的一员，他们称之为生物武器。这是你被创建的实验室。

That's what the lab techs called those augmented abominations adding to the already massive loss of life out there.  Rather dangerous, heavily augmented and mutated.  I don't want to put someone inexperienced in unnecessary danger.

Picked up some gear along the way from a wreck, met up with a guy that went AWOL, eventually followed the trail of breadcrumbs.  And that's how I ended up at that lab...
translation: 我住在一个相对较小的小镇上，但没过多久事情就变得繁忙起来。我决定尽我所能收拾好行装，并遵循我所掌握的证据。沿途从一艘沉船上捡起一些装备，遇到了一个逃走的家伙，最后追踪到了面包屑的踪迹。这就是我在那个实验室的结局。。。

original: I'd like for you to go scout out a small lab installation, associated what they called the Bio-Weapon Project.  Recently there was a security breach logged on what's left of the laboratory network, and I have reason to believe that a number of renegade former experiments, what locals have come to label augmented abominations, might be responsible.  If you can reach that place and bring back one of the badges those things wear, I'll be willing to trust you with more complicated missions.
translation: 我想让你去侦察一个小型的实验室装置，他们称之为生物武器项目。最近，实验室网络的剩余部分出现了一个安全漏洞，我有理由相信，一些叛变的前实验，当地人称之为“扩大的可憎动物”，可能对此负责。如果你能到达那个地方并带回那些东西佩戴的徽章，我愿意把更复杂的任务交给你。

original: Let me give you the basics.  Some time ago, the military launched a joint research project with an end goal of creating artificial combatants, made to perform various specific tasks - basically, living weapons.  They wanted them to be as low-maintenance as possible.  So to accomplish that, the research team used resources from already ongoing projects to first mutate and then cybernetically enhance humans, focusing on developing whatever qualities the military needed at the time.  This lab is one of several places in which the actual modifications were performed.
translation: 让我给你一些基本知识。不久前，军方启动了一项联合研究项目，最终目标是创造人工战斗员，用于执行各种具体任务——基本上是活武器。他们希望它们尽可能低维护。因此，为了实现这一目标，研究团队利用已经在进行的项目中的资源，首先对人类进行变异，然后在控制论上增强人类，重点发展当时军队需要的任何品质。该实验室是进行实际修改的几个地方之一。

original: No.  Place was fairly quiet initially, no sign of those things when we arrived.  We went in to make sure it was clear, then the guy I was traveling with kept watch outside.  Was maybe a day or two of turning the place inside-out when a group of them swarmed the area, tore the poor bastard apart.  I think he took a few with him, but even they aren't all immune to this zombie thing.  I holed up in the bunker once I realized I was alone...
translation: 不，一开始那个地方相当安静，我们到达时并没有那个些东西的迹象。我们进去确认清楚了，然后和我一起旅行的那个人在外面守望。也许是一两天的时间，当一群人蜂拥而至，把这个可怜的混蛋撕成碎片时，把这个地方翻了个底朝天。我想他带了一些，但即使是他们也不能对僵尸免疫。当我意识到只有我一个人时，我躲在地堡里。。。

original: Shit.  Seems it's harder to hide than I thought.  They sent me to investigate what happened to these installations, re-establish contact with any remaining personnel or bio-weapons that haven't gone rogue, then see what can be done from there.  I don't know what your last orders were or why you're here, but maybe we have a common goal.
translation: 倒霉。似乎比我想象的更难隐藏。他们派我去调查这些设施发生了什么，重新与没有流氓的任何剩余人员或生物武器建立联系，然后看看能从那里做些什么。我不知道你最后的订单是什么，也不知道你为什么来这里，但也许我们有一个共同的目标。

original: Sure!  This is the recreation room and lobby, and the kitchen is next to it.  Down there is the main hallway.  First door on the left is the dormitory, the Bio-Weapons are usually there.  Across from that is just a bunch of junk metal.  Down the hall you have the restroom on the right, then the research room on the left.  Our leader, Router, is there.  He can be a weirdo but he keeps us safe.  Go talk to people if you need anything.
translation: 当然这是娱乐室和大堂，厨房就在旁边。下面是主走廊。左边的第一扇门是宿舍，生物武器通常就在那里。对面就是一堆垃圾金属。沿着大厅，右边是洗手间，左边是研究室。我们的领导人，路由器，在那里。他可能是个怪人，但他保证了我们的安全。如果你需要什么，去和别人谈谈。

original: Survival, and eventually research.  We'll manage given time.  Keep an eye on Sigma and Lambda while you're at it… talk to them maybe?  I've been busy working on repairs almost constantly, and they're both likely to go stir-crazy if they have nothing to do but sit around all day.  Might help them figure out for themselves what to do.
translation: 生存，最终研究。给我们时间，我们会设法的。注意Sigma和Lambda，也许可以和他们谈谈？我几乎一直在忙着修理工作，如果他们整天无所事事，都会发疯。也许能帮他们自己弄清楚该怎么办。

original: Targeted mutagenic treatment has altered your neurology.  You find it a bit easier to handle the death of your enemies, combat skills develop somewhat faster, and you find technical skills slightly easier.  In exchange, you find learning from books a bit slower, and it is slightly harder to persuade or deceive others.
translation: 有针对性的诱变治疗改变了你的神经系统。你会发现对付敌人的死亡会更容易一些，战斗技能的发展会更快一些，而技术技能也会更容易一些。作为交换，你会发现从书本上学习要慢一点，说服或欺骗他人也要稍微困难一点。

original: That would explain it then.  That you're here and not hostile at least confirms you're still on humanity's side.  We're here because of Apophis.  He was built to exterminate the Bio-Weapon Project, along with every person involved in your creation.  He's attracted several failed experiments to his cause as well.  They shouldn't have rushed so many victims through those procedures… we need to gather intel and make allies, more people like you.  I'm willing to trust you with this, if you're prepared for some hard fights ahead.
translation: 那就可以解释了。你在这里，没有敌意，至少证实了你仍然站在人类一边。我们来这里是因为阿波菲斯。他生来就是为了消灭生物武器项目，以及你创造的每一个人。他的事业也吸引了几次失败的实验。他们不应该让这么多受害者匆忙通过这些程序…我们需要收集情报，建立盟友，更多像你们这样的人。我愿意相信你，如果你已经准备好迎接未来的艰苦战斗的话。

Even if it was two steps forward, one step back, Apophis is the culmination of all that research.  I know you might be eager to fight, but we need to prepare ourselves.
translation: 你可能是这样，但当你陷入停滞时，其他研究团队一直在仔细研究他们从你的产品中得到的每一点数据。即使是前进两步，后退一步，阿波菲斯也是所有这些研究的顶峰。我知道你可能渴望战斗，但我们需要做好准备。

original: You have that badge, you should know how powerful those things are.  Apophis could take them all at once.  Have you seen a zombie hulk?  They couldn't even scratch it.
